name: Sylvan Awakening
text: Until end of turn, all lands you control become 2/2 creatures with reach, indestructible, and haste. They're still lands.
flavor: The forest awakens, its guardians rising to defend their home.

name: Celestial Arbiter
text:
Flying, reach
During your turn, opponents can't cast spells.
Whenever Celestial Arbiter attacks, you may exile target nonland permanent until Celestial Arbiter leaves the battlefield.
simplifiedtext:
Flying, reach
Opponents can't cast spells during your turn.
Whenever Celestial Arbiter attacks, you may exile target nonland permanent until it leaves the battlefield.

name: Cursed Conduit
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor: The curse spreads, birthing an army of the damned.

name: Mirror of Reflection
text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Mirror of Reflection become a copy of that creature until end of turn. If you do, it gains haste.

name: Chaotic Inferno
text: Chaotic Inferno deals 2 damage to each creature and each player. Scry X, where X is the number of creatures and players damaged this way.
flavor: In the midst of chaos, the flames dance with wild abandon, leaving only ash in their wake.

name: Illusionary Reflection
text: When Illusionary Reflection enters the battlefield, choose an enchantment on the battlefield. Illusionary Reflection becomes a copy of that enchantment.
flavor: Reflections of reality, twisted by the mind's eye.

name: Enchanted Grove
text:
When Enchanted Grove enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Mistweaver
text:
Flash
When Mistweaver enters the battlefield, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.

name: Crystal Shard
text: {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: In the blink of an eye, the mighty can be humbled.

name: Shadow Stalker
text:
Deathtouch
Whenever Shadow Stalker deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.

name: Nurturing Nymph
text: When Nurturing Nymph enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Tranquil Sanctuary
text:
Whenever you gain life, you may create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.
Creatures you control have hexproof.

name: Forest Guardian
text:
When Forest Guardian enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
Enchanted creature you control has hexproof.

name: Flame Burst
text: Flame Burst deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Proliferate.
flavor: The spark of destruction ignites the flames of change.

name: Wildfire Elemental
text:
Wildfire Elemental enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each enchantment you control.

Reach
flavor: Born from the flames, it thrives on the chaos of burning skies.

name: Necrotic Grasp
text: Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
flavor: Death's touch leaves a lasting mark.

name: Verdant Growth
text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor: Nature's touch brings forth abundant growth.
